codePost:
insert into virtual_domain_role
 (id, version,allow_delete, allow_get, allow_post, allow_put, role_name,virtual_domain_id) 
values
( hibernate_sequence.nextval, 0, 
   nvl(:ALLOW_DELETE,0),
  nvl(:ALLOW_GET,1),
  nvl(:ALLOW_POST,0),
  nvl(:ALLOW_PUT,0),
  :ROLE_NAME,
  :VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_ID
)
codePut:
update virtual_domain_role
set version=version+1,
allow_delete=nvl(:ALLOW_DELETE,0),
allow_get=nvl(:ALLOW_GET,1),
allow_post=nvl(:ALLOW_POST,0),
allow_put=nvl(:ALLOW_PUT,0),
role_name=:ROLE_NAME,
virtual_domain_id=:VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_ID
where id=:id
codeGet:
select 
  id "id",
  to_char(allow_delete) allow_delete, /* cannot use int 0/1 for checkbox in AngularJS*/
  to_char(allow_get) allow_get,
  to_char(allow_post) allow_post,
  to_char(allow_put) allow_put,
  role_name,
  virtual_domain_id
from virtual_domain_role
where id = nvl(:id,id)
  and virtual_domain_id=nvl(:virtual_domain_id,virtual_domain_id)
